entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-English output from `build.cmd` are displayed as gibberish #90069
  • Dynamically adding nested properties when using an ExpandoObject instance #90064
  • Move `Compiler/Win32Resources` and their namespace to more general place #90063
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90060
    Future

Closed

  • [Blazor] Slow startup and navigation when debugging #80446
    8.0.0
  • DebuggerTests.MiscTests.CannotDebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithoutPdb test timed out on CI #81294
    8.0.0
  • CheckProjects test failing #89993
    8.0.0
  • MayBeNullWhen(false) Not Applied #90062
  • why Conserve memory dont have in runtimeconfig.json #88013
    8.0.0
  • Track the New Dynamic Heap Configurations via the GC Configuration API. #87030
    9.0.0
  • String.Replace(char, char) now slower in some cases #74771
    7.0.0
  • GC.AllocateUninitializedArray has regressed on macOS #65198
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 188 Regressions from GC changes #74014
    8.0.0
  • Perf measurement changed due to BDN update #66664
    8.0.0
  • BenchmarksGame.BinaryTrees benchmarks have regressed #67958
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Char> and ByteMark #66665
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Byte> #72477
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add note about creating arrays using newobj #90070
    area-Meta
  • Fix mono's Wsingle-bit-bitfield-constant-conversion #90068
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix an assert and clean up a codegen issue #90067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90066
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90065
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • [wasm] Fix startup without emcc -g option #89872
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Do not suppress inlining of random threadstatics #90055
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reserve FOH segments in ExecutionAllocator and properly report them to debugger #90047
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rename area-ILVerification to area-Tools-ILVerification #89698
    area-Meta
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Recover some lost EH performance on Unix amd64 #90033
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2237008 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][debugger] Support debug inline array #90026
    area-Debugger-mono
  • proof of concept #90058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 vector right-shift must dead-code eliminate if the constant is zero. #90051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • By value out fixes #89982
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
